mapper.select: select t.id , t.sys_image_id, t.cpu_core , t.memory , t.sys_disk , t.data_disk , t.type , t.start_time , t.end_time , t.fee , t.is_paid from bill b join bill_detail b_d on b_d.bill_id = b.id join cloud_host_bill_detail t on b_d.item_type = 1 and t.id = b_d.item_id where b.id = #{billId}

select bd.id, bd.host_id, bd.type, bd.cpu_core, bd.cpu_used, bd.memory, bd.memory_used, bd.sys_image_id, bd.sys_disk, bd.data_disk, bd.sys_disk_used, bd.data_disk_used, bd.disk_read, bd.disk_write, bd.bandwidth, bd.network_traffic, bd.start_time, bd.end_time, bd.fee, bd.is_paid, bd.create_time from cloud_host_bill_detail bd where bd.end_time is null and bd.start_time < #{beforeTime} limit 1

select bd.id, bd.host_id, bd.type, bd.cpu_core, bd.cpu_used, bd.memory, bd.memory_used, bd.sys_image_id, bd.sys_disk, bd.data_disk, bd.sys_disk_used, bd.data_disk_used, bd.disk_read, bd.disk_write, bd.bandwidth, bd.network_traffic, bd.start_time, bd.end_time, bd.fee, bd.is_paid, bd.create_time from cloud_host_bill_detail bd where bd.end_time is null and bd.host_id = #{hostId} and bd.start_time < #{beforeTime}

select bd.id, bd.host_id, bd.type, bd.cpu_core, bd.cpu_used, bd.memory, bd.memory_used, bd.sys_image_id, bd.sys_disk, bd.data_disk, bd.sys_disk_used, bd.data_disk_used, bd.disk_read, bd.disk_write, bd.bandwidth, bd.network_traffic, bd.start_time, bd.end_time, bd.fee, bd.is_paid, bd.create_time, ch.monthly_price, ch.type hostType from cloud_host_bill_detail bd left join cloud_host ch on bd.host_id = ch.id where bd.end_time is null and ch.user_id = #{userId} and bd.start_time < #{beforeTime}

select sum(t.fee) from cloud_host_bill_detail t left join bill_detail b_d on t.id = b_d.item_id left join bill b on b_d.bill_id = b.id left join terminal_user u on b.user_id = u.id where u.belonging_id = #{userId} and t.is_paid = 2

select sum(t.fee) from cloud_host_bill_detail t left join bill_detail b_d on t.id = b_d.item_id left join bill b on b_d.bill_id = b.id left join terminal_user u on b.user_id = u.id where u.belonging_id = #{userId} and t.is_paid = 2 and t.type = 1

select sum(t.fee) from cloud_host_bill_detail t left join bill_detail b_d on t.id = b_d.item_id left join bill b on b_d.bill_id = b.id left join terminal_user u on b.user_id = u.id where u.belonging_id = #{userId} and t.is_paid = 2 and t.type = 2

select count(1) from (select date_format(a.end_time, '%Y%m') from cloud_host_bill_detail a,cloud_host b,terminal_user c where a.type=4 and a.is_paid=2 and a.host_id = b.id and b.user_id = c.id and c.belonging_id=#{id} group by date_format(a.end_time, '%Y%m')) d

select sum(t.fee) from cloud_host_bill_detail t left join cloud_host c on t.host_id=c.id left join terminal_user u on c.user_id = u.id where u.belonging_id = #{userId} and c.type=2 and t.is_paid = 2 and t.type = 4 and t.end_time like #{time}
and c.region = #{region}
mapper.insert: insert into cloud_host_bill_detail ( id, host_id, type, cpu_core, cpu_used, memory, memory_used, sys_image_id, sys_disk, sys_disk_used, data_disk, data_disk_used, disk_read, disk_write, bandwidth, network_traffic, start_time, end_time, fee, is_paid, create_time) values (#{id}, #{host_id}, #{type}, #{cpuCore}, #{cpuUsed}, #{memory}, #{memoryUsed}, #{sysImageId}, #{sysDisk}, #{sysDiskUsed}, #{dataDisk}, #{dataDiskUsed}, #{diskRead}, #{diskWrite}, #{bandwidth}, #{networkTraffic}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{fee}, #{isPaid}, #{createTime})
mapper.update:
update cloud_host_bill_detail
fee = #{fee},
is_paid = #{isPaid},
end_time = #{endTime},
where id = #{id} and is_paid !=2
mapper.delete: delete from cloud_host_bill_detail where host_id in (select id from cloud_host where user_id = #{userId} and type = #{type}) and is_paid = 1
